section.p: If there is a tick in the box, immediately. If not, , and read on.

The fat compiler wants to make a special dish for the king. He needs a certain rare ingredient, a pink rice grain. If you have one, . If not, he says that there is supposed to be one of these strange rice grains in a place called the Black Pagoda, in far-off Akatsurai, way to the east, beyond the Violet Ocean.
'Bring me one and I'll make it worth your while,' he adds.
